messages.title: A Record of Delivery
messages.content: Successfully pressured the Government into u-turning on excluding many loyal NHS workers from the bereavement scheme. Secured a lifesaving cystic fibrosis drug on the NHS. Keeps her promise – holding over 200 advice surgeries.

messages.title: My Pledges to You
messages.content: Continue to be a strong voice for you. Protecting the NHS and securing the funding our local services deserve.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: She'll fight for Hampstead and Kilburn to get the fair funding which our local services deserve.
Tulip will continue her work to tackle rough sleeping and ensure everyone has a safe home.
She will keep up the pressure for more frontline investment in our NHS, helping to secure local services.
Fighting for a strategy to tackle violent crime, ensuring our community is safe.
Tulip will continue to campaign for reliable local train services and stand up to the train companies.
Standing up for our schools to reverse the cuts and give them the resources they need.

mentions.candidate: I am the local choice to keep on representing Hampstead & Kilburn.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Lib Dems can't win here.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Tulip Siddiq can keep the Tories out here.

issues.education: Tulip will continue standing up for our schools to reverse the cuts and give them the resources they need.
issues.health: Tulip will keep up the pressure for more frontline investment in our NHS, helping to secure local services.

housing.content: Securing homes & tackling homelessness – Tulip will continue her work to tackle rough sleeping and ensure everyone has a safe home.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've spent my life in this community. My husband and I are raising our children here, and my family has used the same services that you rely on. This personal connection is why I have been so passionate about standing up for our area.

politicalExperience.achievements: I have kept my promise of being available and accessible: holding regular advice surgeries, visiting every school and being a strong voice in Parliament.

endorsements.endorsement: Tulip has been an outstanding MP for Hampstead and Kilburn.

quotes.text: She is a credit to the Labour Party and the constituents she represents.

images.caption: Various images of Tulip Siddiq engaging with constituents, at events, and with local residents.
